```{r}

library(readr)
library(dplyr)

austinhouse = read.csv("austinHousingData.csv")
austinhouse2 = select(austinhouse, -3, -5,-24, -25, -26, -32, -33 , -47) #removes desired columns
austinhouse3 = filter(austinhouse2, homeType == "Single Family") #filters to only single family homes
austinhouse3

write.csv(austinhouse3, "C:/Users/Ethan/Documents/College/stor 664/AustinHousingDataFiltered.csv", row.names = FALSE)


```
